author: dennisl
msg: Update to a released parent and remove stuff that is available in that version of the parent.
Add properties to compile for Java 1.2.

author: eglynn
msg: Modified ColocFeature so that a DeferredConduitSelector is also installed, avoiding the need to explicitly configure this also.

author: samisa
msg: Updated the configure scripts, INSTALL files and fixed the make check problems in line with the suggestions made by chris

author: antelder
msg: Change all the samples to use the top-level SCA pom and to include the Incubator repo. This is an attempt to have the samples run by just doing a mvn in the individual sample directory without having first run mvn in the sample parent folder or doing a local SCA build. Still not sure if this is perfect so if anyone has a better way to set this up...
